facility.name: Library
facility.notes: Quiet zone; open from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM

facility.name: Gymnasium
facility.notes: Room number is W-210; equipment includes treadmills, bikes, and weights

facility.name: Cafeteria
facility.notes: Offers meals and snacks; open from 6:30 AM to 8:30 PM

facility.name: Swimming Pool
facility.notes: Open from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM; lifeguard on duty

facility.name: Art Studio
facility.notes: Room number is E-305; hosts art classes twice a week

services.name: Meal Delivery Service
services.availability: 7 days a week, 8:00 AM to 7:00 PM
services.notes: Customized meals available for dietary needs, including diabetic and low-sodium options.

services.name: Housekeeping Service
services.notes: Includes bed linen changes, dusting, and vacuuming.

services.name: Medical Assistance
services.notes: Emergency response and routine checkups available.

services.name: Transportation Service
services.availability: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
services.notes: Free transportation for medical appointments and local shopping trips.

services.name: Fitness Classes
services.availability: Monday, Wednesday, Friday; 10:00 AM to 11:00 AM
services.notes: Yoga, aerobics, and strength-building exercises led by certified instructors.

services.name: Group Therapy Sessions
services.notes: Support groups for stress management, grief counseling, and more.

services.name: Personal Care Assistance
services.notes: Help with bathing, dressing, and other daily activities.

services.name: Technology Assistance
services.notes: Support for using smartphones, tablets, and computers.

services.name: Social Events Planning
services.notes: Organizes movie nights, holiday parties, and hobby clubs.

services.name: Laundry Service
services.notes: Includes washing, drying, and folding of clothes and linens.

services.name: Pet Therapy
services.notes: Residents can interact with trained therapy animals.

services.name: On-Site Pharmacy
services.availability: Monday to Saturday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM
services.notes: Prescription refills and consultations available.

services.name: Wellness Workshops
services.notes: Topics include nutrition, mental health, and disease prevention.

services.name: Reading Club Meetings
services.notes: Hosted in the library; book selections rotate monthly.

services.name: Art Classes
services.availability: Twice weekly, Tuesday and Thursday, 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM
services.notes: Painting, sculpting, and other creative activities.

services.name: Memory Care Activities
services.notes: Puzzles, music therapy, and reminiscence sessions for cognitive stimulation.

services.name: Spiritual Support
services.notes: Weekly interfaith services and pastoral counseling.

services.name: Hairdressing and Grooming
services.notes: Haircuts, styling, and grooming services available on-site.

services.name: Gardening Club
services.notes: Residents collaborate on maintaining the community garden.

services.name: Music Therapy Sessions
services.notes: Group sessions focused on relaxation and emotional expression through music.
